alert.note: Alert for Black Mesa Area; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas South of Hwy 264 (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 01 at 5:01AM MST until January 01 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING ABOVE 6000 FEET... * WHAT...Periods of snow, decreasing later this morning. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph, leading to areas of blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Areas above 6000 feet near Dilkon and Shonto. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Additional snow forecast from 4 AM Today to 11 AM Today: Dilkon 1 to 2 inches Shonto 0 to 1 inches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Black Mesa Area; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas South of Hwy 264
